      • getRealmForAMSDK

        public static String getRealmForAMSDK(String amsdkdn,
                                      String inrealm)
        Returns the realm name that contains the AMSDK plugin with the given organization dn. The function optionally takes "inrealm" the realm, where the initial search would be done If not found, returns null.
